column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A Toyota Prius smashed into an Indian tuk-tuk
column4: overturning the 3 wheeler and seriously injured the Passap driver. The Prius driver then drove away from the scene
column5: leaving the front bumper behind.------The incident occurred at 11:10 pm on February 28
column7: along the 1003 block of 1958 in the neighborhood. Phnom Penh Thmey
column8: Sen Sok District.------The injured man was taken to hospital and police are searching for the runaway driver. ------RASMEI
